Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the next activity in each variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER across all variants containing this activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment in successful variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to Payment Handled in variants that complete without rejections
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average duration of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average duration of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER compared to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants with prior rejections
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to final process completion (Payment Handled) in variants requiring pre-approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time required for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER when followed directly by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER is initiated after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER to the subsequent approval or rejection decision by the PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in efficient variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in variants that include only one approval step before supervisor finalization
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER in 2017 versus 2018 cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
